description: {"blocks":[{"key":"74n0c","text":"This protocol is good for DNA extraction from microbial fungi isolated from aquatic insect guts. It works for small input tissues (starting from one fungal thallus). The product can be used for PCR and Sanger sequencing directly, which is ideal for fungal barcode analyses. This protocol is modified from a method described in Gottlieb and Lichtwardt 2001 (Mycologia Vol. 93, No. 1, pp. 66-81).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada
Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a4t07","text":"Suspend fungal thalli and spores in a 1.5 mL centrifuge tube with 2x CTAB buffer ( ). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":82,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7m95s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"E1775470A7A111ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9b9vo","text":"Freeze and thaw the sample three times by submerging the tube into liquid nitrogen and incubating it at  using a heat block.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":104,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c2sf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"08DCA060A7A211ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"65","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ep4a5","text":"After the final thaw, crush the fungal tissues using a disposable pellet pestle (for 1.5 mL microtube).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":54,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"220hm","text":"Cool the sample for    .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c6j1e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"39CFC120A7A211ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"585D8FF0A7A211ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjmqs","text":"Add   Proteinase K   to the tube and mix them by inverting the tube three times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e7jt2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"615EDC30A7A211ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"20","error_concentration":false,"guid":"67E898C0A7A211ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"oict","text":"Warm the tube at  for   using a heat block.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1mfs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8A5E5020A7A211ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"65","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"910A3AB0A7A211ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8d6bc","text":"Centrifuge at   and transfer the supernatant to a new tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d506u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"12000","duration":120,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AC69ACF0A7A211ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qtsf","text":"Add Chloroform: Isoamyl alcohol (24:1) with an equal volume of the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9le1p","text":"Shake the mixture slowly for   on a rotator and leave the tube on the rack for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fs4sa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"E08536D0A7A211ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"F3E2CB70A7A211ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jt6l","text":"Centrifuge at   and transfer the top layer to another tube with wide-bore tips, avoiding breaking DNAs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fi54c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13000","duration":240,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"051CE3D0A7A311ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6p7ui","text":"Transfer the supernatant to a new tube and repeat steps 8-10.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9194p","text":"Add   RNase A ( ) and incubate at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":34,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4h978","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"246F3B20A7A311ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"C743A610A7A311ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D908C060A7A311ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2400,"guid":"E05B2420A7A311ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5tf4j","text":"Add Isopropanol (stored at  ) with a 66% volume of the product from the last step and mix by inversion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a5jli","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EDF99F30A7A311ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e29jv","text":"Leave the tube at   for at least   (or overnight) until fully precipitated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1up5v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"42017334A7A411ECB5830A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":18000,"guid":"1C978550A7A411ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dhoiu","text":"Centrifuge at   with the cap opening side pointing to the centrifuge center.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8t6cj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4A489A70A7A411ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"br8pb","text":"Immediately dump the supernatant and transfer the tube (with the cap open \u0026 upside down) on the paper towel to absorb the remaining supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b7m28","text":"Leave the cap open on rack.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5340h","text":"Add   70% ethanol (stored at  ) to the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1g2v1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"6615C2A0A7A411ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6EDE2490A7A411ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a8fph","text":"Cap it and use the finger to tap the tube gently.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"188f2","text":"Centrifuge at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9q2vf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7A42B530A7A411ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"376f1","text":"Repeat step 16.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c515","text":"Leave the tube at   with the cap open and a piece of Kimwipe paper on top for   or until the DNA becomes dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8levn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"88B60C70A7A411ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"A9D9C7AAA7A411ECB5830A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4uvjj","text":"Add   H2O to the dried DNA in the tube and wait for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":7,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"app9f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"BE905D50A7A411ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"C6AD3D00A7A411ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"imil","text":"Pipette and store the DNA in the tube at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CE1B3F10A7A411ECAF0F27D07BDEDA4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}
